testimonials.title: What our parents say on Google

items.name: Aidelyn Brage
items.text: I'm so happy with the care my child receives at ABC Kidz Preschool Daycare! The staff is kind, patient, and always professional. The place is clean, safe, and very well organized. Highly recommended!

items.name: Jessica Summers
items.text: ABC kidz is a more than great daycare/school for kids to attend they are very friendly professional and caring for our little ones my son that went into kindergarten wants to come back here everyday with his sisters

items.name: Mariana Garcia
items.text: One of the best experiences for our child and us as parents! The attention, affection, and quality of care are exceptional âœ¨ We will miss them so much, so grateful for the work they did with my little one âœ¨

items.name: Maria Parra
items.text: Excellent service, the teachers are lovely. I go to work knowing my baby is well cared for and learning ðŸ¥°

meta.title: About Us - ABC Kids | Our Story and Values
meta.description: Learn about ABC Kids' story, mission and values. Over 15 years providing quality education and child care in Tampa, FL.
meta.keywords: about ABC Kids, Tampa daycare, history, values, mission, educational team, Tampa child care

hero.title: Creating Bright Futures Since 2009
hero.subtitle: We are more than a daycare. We are a family committed to the comprehensive development of each child, providing quality education with love and dedication.

care.title: Care with Love
care.description: Every child is treated as part of our family, with genuine affection and personalized attention.

excellence.title: Educational Excellence
excellence.description: Quality educational programs that prepare children for a bright future.

community.title: United Community
community.description: We build strong relationships with families, working together for the wellbeing of each child.

story.label: Our Story
story.title: It Started with a Dream and a Lot of Heart
story.paragraph1: ABC Kids was born in 2009 from the dream of creating a space where every child could develop their full potential in a safe, loving and stimulating environment. Since then, we have been home away from home for hundreds of families in Tampa.
story.paragraph2: Our founder, with over 15 years of experience in early childhood education, wanted to create a different center: one where children were not only cared for, but truly loved and educated with an excellent curriculum.
story.paragraph3: Today, we are proudly recognized by our community as a benchmark in bilingual education and quality child care, always maintaining that family touch that characterizes us.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To provide the highest quality education and child care, creating an environment where every child can grow, learn and develop in all dimensions: physical, cognitive, social and emotional.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision and action at ABC Kids

love.title: Love and Care
love.description: Every child is treated with the love and care they deserve, creating strong and lasting emotional bonds.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Certified facilities and trained staff to guarantee the wellbeing of every child at all times.

education.title: Quality Education
education.description: Structured curriculum adapted to each stage of development, preparing children for success.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: Constant commitment to continuous improvement and the highest standards in early childhood education.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build strong relationships with families, working together for the wellbeing of each child.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We incorporate modern pedagogical methods and technology to enrich the learning experience.

team.label: Our Team
team.title: The Heart of ABC Kids
team.subtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to your child's care and development
team.introTitle: A team that makes a difference
team.introParagraph1: At ABC Kids, our team is the true heart of everything we do. Each member has been carefully selected not only for their experience and skills, but for their genuine love for children and their commitment to quality early childhood education.
team.introParagraph2: We are a diverse group of passionate educators, each bringing their unique experience, but all united by a common mission: to create an environment where every child can flourish, learn and feel truly loved.
qualities: Genuine passion for child development and wellbeing
Years of experience working with children of all ages
Bilingual team (English-Spanish) for better communication with all families
Small groups that allow personalized attention to each child
Continuous training in first aid, safety and best educational practices
Commitment to creating an environment where every child feels valued and heard
team.closingStatement: Because for us, every child is not just a student, they are part of our ABC Kids family.

meta.title: Terms and Conditions - ABC Kids | Policies and Services
meta.description: Read our terms and conditions, enrollment policies, hours and payments. Download the complete parents handbook.
meta.keywords: ABC Kids terms, Tampa daycare policies, parents handbook, service conditions, enrollment

hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Important information about our services, policies and procedures

items.subtitle: Enrollment Process
items.content: To enroll your child at ABC Kids, you must complete all required forms, including emergency contact information, medical authorizations and pediatrician data. Enrollment is completed once the initial registration fee is paid.

items.subtitle: Required Documentation
content: Child's birth certificate
Updated immunization record
Recent physical exam (not older than 6 months)
Emergency contact form
Signed authorizations for activities and medications

items.subtitle: Age and Requirements
items.content: We accept children from 6 weeks to 5 years old. All children must be up to date with their vaccinations according to Florida state requirements.

items.subtitle: Operating Hours
items.content: We are open Monday through Friday from 7:00 AM to 6:00 PM. We remain closed on federal holidays and during year-end holidays according to annual calendar.

items.subtitle: Drop-off and Pick-up
content: Children must be dropped off and picked up personally by parents or authorized guardians
Signature required on check-in and check-out log
Arrivals after 9:30 AM may disrupt scheduled activities
Late pick-ups (after 6:00 PM) incur additional charges of $1 per minute

items.subtitle: Holidays
items.content: The center remains closed on federal holidays. An annual calendar is provided at the beginning of the school year with all closure dates.

items.subtitle: Registration and Monthly Fee
items.content: A non-refundable initial registration fee is required at enrollment. Monthly fees are paid in advance on the first day of each month.

items.subtitle: Payment Methods
content: Bank transfer or ACH (preferred)
Credit or debit card
Check or money order
Late payments incur a $25 charge after 5 days

items.subtitle: Refund Policy
items.content: No refunds are granted for absences, vacations or holidays. 30 days written notice is required to cancel enrollment.

items.subtitle: Additional Charges
items.content: Additional services such as field trips, school photos or special events may have extra charges that will be communicated in advance.

items.subtitle: Illness Policy
content: Children with fever above 100Â°F cannot attend
Must stay home for 24 hours after fever subsides without medication
Notify the center about contagious illnesses
Staff may request that you pick up a sick child at any time

items.subtitle: Medications
items.content: Medications will only be administered with written parental authorization and in their original labeled container. Staff must be informed about allergies or special medical conditions.

items.subtitle: Discipline
items.content: We use positive discipline techniques. No physical or verbal punishment is allowed. We work with parents to address behavior issues.

items.subtitle: Safety
content: Regular fire and emergency drills
All visitors must register at the front desk
Security camera system in all areas
Staff trained in first aid and CPR

download.title: Complete Parents Handbook
download.description: For more detailed information about our policies, procedures and services, download our complete handbook.
download.fileInfo: ABC KIDZ Facility Parents Handbook - PDF

termsPage.contactNote: Have questions about our terms and policies? Don't hesitate to contact us at (813) 512-2511 or visit us in person.
